arts.ttl: Portsmouth hit back to hold Watford
arts.sum: Adrian Segecic made sure Watford's dismal away form continued as his 79th-minute equaliser handed Portsmouth a 2-2 draw at Fratton Park.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth vs Watford predictions: Well-matched rivals set for a draw
arts.sum: Portsmouth and Watford both have eight Championship points and that is evidence enough to convince Jack Ogalbe that these two will play out a draw at Fratton Park.

arts.ttl: Chaplin and Pack start: Portsmouth team news and predicted XI to face Watford
arts.sum: The latest Portsmouth team news as John Mousinho's side gear up to face Watford in the Championship on Wednesday night. The post Chaplin and Pack start: Portsmouth team news and predicted XI to face Watford appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth vs Watford - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Championship clash between Portsmouth and Watford, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
